paper_abstract: Using non-rigid group theory, it is shown that the full non-rigid(f-NRG) group of 1,4-dimethybenzene (p-xylene) is isomorphic to the group C(2) x G of order 36, where G = C(3) wr C(2) and wr stands for wreath product. This group has 18 conjugacy classes and irreducible representations. Then the character table of the full non-rigid p-xylene is derived.
paper_title: Computation of the character table for p-Xylene
